So, unless people become more educated and gain confidence in the Pak gov, it will take some more time to deal with extremism. 

The good news currently is that the religious extreme political party has supposedly left the Pakistan government now that a women's rights bills was passed. 

So hopefully with their diminished power, a more moderate government will come in the NWFP and the extremists will feel threatened and have to find refuge elsewhere.
